 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָהִיט‎</span>] **noun masculine collective** ==rafters? boards?== (as strips ***running ***between beams ? so [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] conjecture; compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***boards (?) ***, [[BDB#Nö|Nö]] in [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]); — suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָהִיטֵנוּ‎</span> [[Song.1.17|Song 1:17]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רחיטנו‎</span>; Manuscripts <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַח‎</span> [[BDB#Baer|Baer]]<sup>p. 46</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1, 149</sup>), \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִרוֺת‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוֺב‎</span> see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹב‎</span> below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רבב‎</span>. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּב‎</span>] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ריב‎</span>. 

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רחיטנו‎</span> [[Song.1.17|Song 1:17]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]], see [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָחִיט‎</span>] below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רהט‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֵחַיִם‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רחה‎</span>. above
